resources.string: download the wallpaper you love to your internal storage for offline viewing!

All the wallpapers shown in the app are either in public domain or under Creative Commons license for which proper attribution is given to the respective uploaders. No wallpaper is distributed with our app. If an image violates any copyright, please report it to us and we will remove it from our database. For more information, click here.

All logos/images/names are copyrights of their respective owners. These images are not endorsed by any of the perspective owners and the images are used simply for aesthetic purposes. No copyright infringement is intended. Any request to remove one of the logos/images/names will be honoured. None of the images are hosted on the app. Each and every image is hotlinked from a source where hotlinking is allowed.

If you are a photographer or a digital artist and you want your photo/art/image to be taken down, press the button below to email the developers regarding it. The link to the image in the app will be removed from the app soon.
